Posts.Content: Mar 31, 2016 11:56AM Mom77 wrote: I had a follow up appointment with my GP yesterday. She did an exam and said that despite negative mammogram and ultrasound she is still very concerned. I have new dimpling that has formed in the past month, and my breast continues to increase in size. The lump hasn't changed at all. She said 10% of lesions can't be seen on mammogram and US. She is sending an urgent referral to breast clinic for MRI. I asked her if I should be concerned AGAIN and she said she was was concerned. So more waiting
